text: Ana knazamo higeta avu asuhu'nea vahe'mo kanku nehakeno azanteti asarega erieri huno eneviaza huta vano nehune. Ana nehuta zage ferupi vano nehunanagi, hanimpima vano hia vahe'mo'ma masete otite huno vanoma nehiaza huta vano nehune. Hankavezmima me'nea vahe'ma manizafina, fri vahekna huta nemanune.
